articles.author: Rajesh Pandey
articles.title: Google's eSIM transfer tool is finally here with the Pixel 8 - Android Police
articles.description: You can also convert your physical SIM into an eSIM with the tool
articles.content:
Summary
  • All premium smartphones launched in the last couple of years support eSIM.
  • Android needs to improve the eSIM migration process to streamline the transition between devices… [+2592 chars]

articles.title: A planetary collision afterglow and transit of the resultant debris cloud - Nature.com
articles.description: Infrared brightening and luminosity observations from a young, solar-like star suggest a collision between two exoplanets producing a hot, highly extended post-impact remnant and transit of the debris causing the visible light eclipse of the host star.
